item.title: THAT Conference - Call for Speakers is open!
item.content:encoded: We are excited to announce that the THAT Conference 2019 Call for Speakers is now OPEN, and we want you to submit an abstract so fervently that we're putting the link to do so right here!

item.title: Is a SPA less secure than a server rendered web application?
item.content:encoded: In this post, I try to explain some of the differences between a single page application and a server rendered application and why the application types have different threat models.

item.title: Test the latest features with SQL Server 2017 Developer Edition
item.content:encoded: Are you curious how new capabilities in SQL Server will impact your applications? Download and test SQL Server 2017 Developer Edition, a full-featured free edition, licensed for use as a development and test database in a non-production environment. You can browse and access SQL Server code samples at GitHub, and when youâ€™re ready, check out your options to move to production.
